text:
Tracking #COVID19 in the USA via @nytimes 

Hard to believe that 3,611 Americans died yesterday yet STILL some idiot media & gullible people believe it’s a hoax & refuse to follow the rules on how to stop the spread.

But if they don’t want the #vaccine - they don’t have to! 🙄 https://t.co/79XAKkVBjc
